Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: The restaurant is well located and has an original decoration. The food however was not what I expected. The chef is Spanish but it didn't seem like Spanish food to me. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Yesterday we where at Pikoteo. It was our first time there, we where celebrating the birthday of my boyfriend. I chose this place after reading all the good reviews and because it was dog friendly. We have an adorable French bulldog Pierre. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Very nice, just came across it while heading to the ferry and decided to have a beer on the sunny terrace.. after checking their menu also decided to try their hand chopped steak tartare and it was indeed a very good decision.. will come back soon for sure to try their other tapas..

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Had an amazing birthday meal out here, really enjoyed both the cocktails and food. The salad with celery sorbet dressing was a highlight! Very friendly service and great terrace for soaking up the evening sun.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Interesting flavors but really overpriced, and I was still hungry in the end, after spending 35‚Ç¨/person. I will not come back and don't recommend the place.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Really great food place and service. Spanish tapas with a Spanish head chef but with fusion flavours and twists - we absolutely loved the combinations. Really top quality ingredients freshly prepared. We visited on a rainy evening when it was cosy and buzzy inside but must be lovely in the sun on the water too.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Best food experience in Amsterdam. Not the ‚Äúusual‚Äù restaurant but something different with really good combination of food. We tried basically everything and we came back for another time in the same week. Star of the evening was the ‚Ä¶

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Great food - it's got really great flavour with lots of local ingredients. Very well noted allergens too. Nice quiet location - although not your classic charming architecture. Not super cheap either but top quality food.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Wow we really enjoyed our dining experience here. This place has a casual fun feel with old cans as holders for things on the tables. Our server offered a prosecco to start with which we couldn't refuse, it was the perfect beginning to the ‚Ä¶

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Original Spanish taste in a peaceful location. Tasty food following the original recipes. Very recommended to try Arroz Abanda, Croquetas jam√≥n and tortilla! We will go back!

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Pretty tasty food! Good atmosphere. I would recommend the octopus üêô.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Delicious Spanish food with a modern fusion touch. It is nicely located next to a canal and the staff is friendly. A place to go back to! Prices on the medium to high range.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Just enjoyed our dinner here with 7. Good food, friendly personnel and casual atmosphere. Especially the orangery is cozy. Crayfish ceviche üëç Price wise it's a bit on the expensive side, but worth it.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: A really fantastic and modern take on tapas. The dishes were super inventive and thoughtful, with taste and flavour at the forefront, while the staff were a pleasure to converse with. Cocktails were absolutely delicious as well. All around a wonderful dining experience.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: We loved this place! Warm and tasty bread! Absolutely delishes olives(can you please share the brand?;)) and super interesting menu! Food was interesting, well seasoned and ingredients were really good quality. Great place for Friday Borreltijd! Thanks a lot!

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: excellent gastronomic journey. everything is high quality and made with precision. Lovely ambiance and friendly staff. One of the best restaurants in Amsterdam !!

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text:
This place is a must if you love tapas! Tapas of a higher quality than your average "all you can eat" tapas restaurant, creative and for a very reasonable price.
Will go again!

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Delicious food, friendly staff with a great service! Highly recommended. Great location to have a drink net to the canal and enjoy the nice weather outside! Unfortunately, due to Covid the visit had to be limited which is understandable! Apart from that, nothing to complain about.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Well thought servings and great combinations of flavors. Definitely try the Johnny bravas and the manana manana ribs. Only complaint was the service, we felt like the staff had forgotten we were there at times but to their credit, it was very busy. They were very polite and knowledgeable.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Really cool tapas with Asian mix. You can order pigeon or tuna or bread or chicken. The variety is wide and always some fancy stuff on the menu. I really like it and you should give it a try even though the prices for one plate are between ‚Ä¶

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Super gezellig cozy place, with inventive and tasty portions to share. Very happy to be able to dine back inside the restaurant with the fun and happy vibes.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Excellent choice of tapas - try the coconut dessert if it‚Äôs on the menu!

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Favorite restaurant we‚Äôve dined at in all our time in France, Belgium, and the Netherlands. So good we went back our last night in Amsterdam just for the charcuterie and olives again.

Name: Pikoteo

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: We ordered food from Uber Eats (during the pandemic) and it was amazing! We had the pork belly, the ribs and the paella. Punchy and flavourful. Can't wait to visit the restaurant in person.

Name: Pikoteo
Review Text: Had booked dinner for 10pm because we were coming in late to Amsterdam, unfortunately our train was delayed. I called the restaurant and the staff were super accommodating to ensure we were fed and well looked after. Ever dish we ordered ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Great service and very welcoming staff. Surprising selection of tapas! Fun fact #1: some tapas have a an Asian twist whit out going overboard. Fun fact #2: great selection of drinks  without being blown away by to much choice. Highly recommended!

Review Text: This place is a properly hidden gem of Amsterdam, located near a very new neighbourhood with a very surprising menu and wine offering. Food wise I am impressed every time I am trying a new dish. Their taco's are to die for and the ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Absolutely fantastic restaurant. Very attentative staff and really friendly. Dishes are incredibly tasty and not that expensive for the quality you get. I really recommend the pulled pork and the tuna tartar. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Amazing food in one of Amsterdam most beautiful hidden gem! I can highly recommend for food lovers, especially those of us that love fusion! Name: Pikoteo

Review Text: Such an amazing restaurant and staff!  If you're a fan of small plate dining, exquisite Spanish cuisine, and unique cocktails all in a comfortable setting with local appeal, then this wonderful hidden gem is for you!
